ovdesc.p: This application holds details of commission and charge defaults and calculations for a group of fiduciary deposits or an Portfolio or an individual customer. The type and associated minimum, maximum and percentage of the calculated amount to be taken can be specified.

A specific set of conditions can be defined for a customer, or a group, defined on the FD.GEN.CONDITION file. The group applicable to the customer is defined on the CUSTOMER.CHARGE file, in the ACTUAL.GROUP field, associated with the FIDUCIARY application. If a seperate customer condition is applicable, a record will be defined with an id of C-customer no, and this will take precedence over the customer group.

For a specific commission type, a minimuim and maximum commission can be applied, and also a percentage of the calculated commission can be taken. Fiduciary commission calculations are defined on the FD.COMMISSION.TYPE table. The commission type specified will be used as the default when the FD.FID.ORDER is input. The commission type is associated with either a CATEGORY code or the type (i.e. FIXED or NOTICE).

Charges are defined on either the FT.CHARGE.TYPE or FT.COMMISSION.TYPE table, and for each possible charge type, a percentage can be specified. Another percentage to be taken for all other charge types can also be defined.
ID format for the group condition can be "NNN" ,"C-NNNNNN" or "P-NNNNNN-N"
If a portfolio level record exists in FD.GROUP.CONDITION, for any transactions involving the portfolio, the Commission and charges defined in the record will apply

desc.p: Specifies the maximum amount of commission that can be applied in one commission period for the associated DEF.COMM.CD.
The maximum commission amount can be specified in any currency. If the currency is not the same as the order currency, it will be converted at the mid rate.
1-14 numeric amount. (Optional input)

desc.p: The percentage of the calculated OTH.CHRG.CD to be applied to the customer at the associated CHARGE.EVENT of the order.
The percentage specified will be taken for the associated OTHR.CHRG.CD and CHARGE.EVENT if it exists on the order.
0-100 numeric percentage (Optional input)
Input only allowed if associated OTHR.CHRG.CD is present.
The currency in which the maximum and/or minimum commission amount for the associated DEF.COMM.CD is specified.

The system will first check for the currency of the deal in this sub-valued field, then look for the local currency. If neither of these is found the first definition currency is used as the default. The amount will be converted to the deal currency at mid-rate where the currency is different.

A maximum and minimum commission amount for the commission code specified can be defined. The minimum and maximum can be taken at either interest movement, principal movement or both, as specified on the FD.CHARGE.PARAMETER table.
3 character standard SWIFT currency code. (Optional input)
Mandatory if MIN.COMM.AMT or MAX.COMM.AMT is defined.
Duplicate currencies not allowed for each FIDUCIARY type.

The interest settlement date may be announced by the fiduciary bank as a one off payment date, or on a regular frequency.

desc.p: The TYPE or CATEGORY code of the order for which the commission defaults apply.
The type or category code entered must be defined on the FD.CHARGE.PARAMETER file. This holds details of how and when the commission is calculated.
FIXED or NOTICE or 1-3 digit group number (Mandatory input.)
Must exist on FD.CHARGE.PARAMETER.
No null values allowed.

In addition , a Date can be appended with a hyphen in condition that a corresponding CONDITION.PRIORITY record and XX.GEN.CONDITION record exists with this date .

1-3 numeric group number or "C-" followed by 1 to 6 digit customer number or 3-10 alphanumeric customer mnemonic (Mandatory input). If the ID 'C- CUSTOMER NUMBER' is defined for an individual customer, it gets automatically defaulted to the field ACTUAL.GROUP pertaining to FD application (if defined) in the customer's CUSTOMER.CHARGE record.
If a customer number is specified, the customer must exist on the CUSTOMER file.
If a group number is specified, it must exist on the FD.GEN.CONDITION file.
This field will define the time at which the associated charge will be taken.
The charge can either be taken whenever:
- a principal movement takes place; - the contract matures; - the drawdown takes place.
The only options are DRAWDOWN, MATURITY or CHANGE. (optional input)
Default value will be DRAWDOWN.
